Literature.Title: Antimicrobial activity of short, synthetic cationic lipopeptides.
Literature.Author: Laverty G, McLaughlin M, Shaw C, Gorman SP, Gilmore BF

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 35984(MIC=125µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 35984(MBC=250µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=62.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MBC=62.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=125µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MBC=500µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=125µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MBC=250µg/ml),Escherichia coli NCTC 8196(MIC=125µg/ml),Escherichia coli NCTC 8196(MBC=250µg/ml),Candida tropicalis NCTC 7393(MIC=62.5µg/ml),Candida tropicalis NCTC 7393(MFC=62.5µg/ml)
